text: Jordan Glasgow (born June 28, 1996) is an American football linebacker for the Indianapolis Colts of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Michigan. ==College career== After starting his Michigan career as a walk-on, Glasgow earned a scholarship due to his play on special teams and moved into the starting lineup at linebacker for his senior season. ==Professional career== Glasgow was selected by the Indianapolis Colts in the sixth round (213th overall) in the 2020 NFL Draft. ==Personal life== Glasgow is the youngest brother of Graham, who is currently a center for the Denver Broncos, and Ryan, who is a defensive tackle. ==References== ==External links== *Michigan bio Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American football linebackers Category:American football safeties Category:Indianapolis Colts players Category:Michigan Wolverines football players Category:Players of American football from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Aurora, Illinois
title: Jordan Glasgow
